segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the little boy attempting quite a feat over by the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balanced on a small stool, reaching up into an open cupboard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside the cabinet, I can clearly see a large jar labeled "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is already deep inside, pulling out what I assume are delicious treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so wobbly, its legs splayed out at an alarming angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's going to tip right over if he's not careful, and that could be a nasty fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But he looks so determined, completely focused on his mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And look at the little girl next to him, her hand raised, eagerly anticipating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly in on the plan, a silent accomplice in this sweet rebellion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, enacted right under the woman's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their coordinated effort is actually quite impressive to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste those forbidden cookies myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, or worse, fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
